scripts.set_prod_usuarios: cd serviceUsuario && firebase use prod && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=production && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=N && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_prod_correos: cd serviceCorreo && firebase use prod && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=production && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=N && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_prod_equipos: cd serviceEquipo && firebase use prod && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=production && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=N && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_dev_local_usuarios: cd serviceUsuario && firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=Y && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_dev_local_correos: cd serviceCorreo && firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=Y && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_dev_local_equipos: cd serviceEquipo && firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=Y && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_dev_remote_usuarios: cd serviceUsuario && firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=N && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_dev_remote_correos: cd serviceCorreo && firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=N && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_dev_remote_equipos: cd serviceEquipo && firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:set environment.mode=development && firebase functions:config:set environment.local=N && firebase functions:config:get > config.json && firebase functions:config:get && cd ..
scripts.set_prod: npm run set_prod_usuarios && npm run set_prod_correos
scripts.set_dev_local: npm run set_dev_local_usuarios && npm run set_dev_local_correos
scripts.set_dev_remote: npm run set_dev_remote_usuarios && npm run set_dev_remote_correos
